title: chaos_stotch
author: chaos_stotch
content: I'm starting my career as a web developer and I need an income to thrive (and to survive ).This is my company website: https://chaos-stotch.github.io/chaos/We offer modern website development and design. Both frontend and backend.Contact us via email: chaos_stotch@proton.meI am willing to work on anything related to web developmentI accept payment in BTCThe purpose of this post is to find customers, but any tips for growing my business are welcome.Thanks
